channel.title: Auto restart
channel.description: i tried to use auto restarter on hiya source but when i put like 30 min it runs for 30 min then turns off 30 min. I want it to like run for 30 min then just restart the server and start running again right away. This is because every hour or so if my computers not active the runserver thing starts to log everyone out then it says (name) cant log in because they are already online.

item.title: Auto restart
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

i tried to use auto restarter on hiya source but when i put like 30 min it runs for 30 min then turns off 30 min. I want it to like run for 30 min then just restart the server and start running again right away. This is because every hour or so if my computers not active the runserver thing starts to log everyone out then it says (name) cant log in because they are already online.

Read full topic
